note.p: Wife of Robert Waring of Wilford, Nottinghamshire (d. 1662); married as her second husband George Lascelles of Elston (d. 1680). Acquired a life interest in Elston Hall after the death of her son by George Lascelles, John (1669/70–92); lived there with her daughter by Robert Waring, Anne Darwin (bap. 1662 d. 1722).
‘The Darwins & Elston Hall’, Elston Heritage Project, elstonheritage.org.uk (accessed 23 November 2018)
